stripe-demo.plugin.name: Stripe Demo
stripe-demo.config.title: Stripe Configuration
stripe-demo.config.description: Configure your Stripe API key. Only super administrators can access this page.
stripe-demo.config.key.label: Stripe API Key
stripe-demo.config.key.placeholder: Enter your Stripe API key (e.g., sk_test_...)
stripe-demo.config.key.hint: Your Stripe API key starts with sk_test_ for test mode or sk_live_ for live mode
stripe-demo.config.current.label: Current Configuration:
stripe-demo.config.validation.format: Stripe key should start with sk_test_ or sk_live_
